about_the_game:
Step back to an era of Gatsby-style opulence with the Art Deco Interiors tileset! A full tileset of black, white and red interior tiles trimmed in gold to evoke simple but luxurious designs.

The Art Deco Interiors tileset includes:

Ground tiles

Water Tiles (with gold edge)
Five floor/tile patterns (plain, gold block edge, herringbone, rug, and embossed squares) in red, charcoal gray, and white
Two styles of tables in the same colors
Gold edge
Hole tile with gold edge

Wall tiles:

Walls to match flooring, plus wood-edged walls and three art deco wall patterns in various colors.

Also includes:

Stairs to match flooring
Lots of windows to fit many situations – multiple sizes, day-night variations, curtains and without curtains (multiple curtain styles), with and without fan design
Doors to match walls/floor tones
Pillars in multiple colors
Couch and chair in all matching colors
Large dining table
Mirrors
Cabinets and corner cabinets
Shelves (with and without decor)
Piano in all matching colors
Two styles of beds in all matching colors
Chandeliers and lamps in gold
Bathroom fixtures
Diningware and liquor
Art pieces
More not mentioned here!


Events and Animations

Single and double doors to match all interior colors

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
